SELECT CI_INSTR.CRS_INF_ID , CI_INSTR.INSTR_ID , CI_INSTR.INSTR_ML , CI_INSTR.CRS_INF_NM , TODO.TODO_CTT , TODO.TODO_FINISH_YN FROM ( SELECT INSTR.INSTR_ID , INSTR.INSTR_ML , CI.CRS_INF_ID , CI.CRS_INF_NM FROM CRS_INF CI INNER JOIN INSTR ON CI.INSTR_ID = INSTR.INSTR_ID ) CI_INSTR LEFT OUTER JOIN TODO ON CI_INSTR.CRS_INF_ID = TODO.CRS_INF_ID WHERE TODO.CRS_INF_ID = #{crsInfId} AND CI_INSTR.INSTR_ID = #{lgnId}
